org.strongback.components

Interface TwoAxisAccelerometer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ThreeAxisAccelerometer

    public interface TwoAxisAccelerometer
    An accelerometer is a device capable of sensing acceleration. By performing two integrations, an accelerometer can also find velocity and displacement.
    See Also:
    ThreeAxisAccelerometer, Accelerometer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TwoAxisAccelerometer create(Accelerometer xAxis, Accelerometer yAxis)
      Create a 2-axis accelerometer from the two individual accelerometers.
      default TwoAxisAcceleration getAcceleration()
      Get the instantaneous multidimensional acceleration values for all 2 axes.
      default Accelerometer getDirection(int axis)
      Get the accelerometer for the axis with the given index, where 0 is the X-axis and 1 is the Y-axis.
      Accelerometer getXDirection()
      Get the X-axis accelerometer.
      Accelerometer getYDirection()
      Get the Y-axis accelerometer.

    • Method Detail

      • getXDirection

        Accelerometer getXDirection()
        Get the X-axis accelerometer.
        Returns:
        the accelerometer for the X-axis; never null

      • getYDirection

        Accelerometer getYDirection()
        Get the Y-axis accelerometer.
        Returns:
        the accelerometer for the Y-axis; never null

      • getDirection

        default Accelerometer getDirection(int axis)
        Get the accelerometer for the axis with the given index, where 0 is the X-axis and 1 is the Y-axis.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis direction; must be either 0 or 1
        Returns:
        the accelerometer; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if axis is invalid

      • getAcceleration

        default TwoAxisAcceleration getAcceleration()
        Get the instantaneous multidimensional acceleration values for all 2 axes.
        Returns:
        the acceleration values for 2 axes; never null

      • create

        static TwoAxisAccelerometer create(Accelerometer xAxis,
                                   Accelerometer yAxis)
        Create a 2-axis accelerometer from the two individual accelerometers.
        Parameters:
        xAxis - the accelerometer for the X-axis; may not be null
        yAxis - the accelerometer for the Y-axis; may not be null
        Returns:
        the 2-axis accelerometer; never null
